title: Introducing: veyns
body:
It’s always awesome when you stumble across an artist that already has a fairly significant back catalogue of songs.

London teenager **veyns** (Luke Johnston from [Horror House](https://soundcloud.com/horrorhouseband)) already has 30+ songs on his Soundcloud, all in varying degrees of completion and to differing qualities. Ranging from the relatively experimental (dare I say chillwave inspired) _dusk_, to the ambient beauty of _tokyo_, not forgetting his latest release, _submarine_, a track that a twisted Arthur Beatrice would be proud of; there’s more than enough to suggest that he’s a mightily talented kid. Check out a couple of personal favourites below, and more over at his [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/veyns).
